title: 3 and Out - Tomlin EQ, Arch Manning → Texas Q's, Dan Snyder Disaster, RIP Goose
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Tomlin EQ, Arch Manning → Texas Q's, Dan Snyder Disaster, RIP Goose
description:
John discusses why Mike Tomlin’s leadership qualities make him so valuable in a play calling head coach's league, why the NBA draft is so much less relatable than the NFL Draft, if Arch Manning is a lock to win big with Sark at Texas, what Deshaun Watson settling 20 of his civil cases means for his suspension, and if Dan Snyder can survive despite congressional hearings regarding his sexual misconduct.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always  FanDuel for the best wagering action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
